author: smuzaffar
body: This fixes https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/42059 ASAN runtime issue. This looks like a GCC bug as reported in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/40902#issuecomment-1448914700 . Local tests shows that failing ASAN workflow runs after this change
title: [ASAN] Fix runtime error by moving std::regex code in anonymous namespace
